## $iter variable

Helper function used by various transducers to wrap themselves as transforming iterators. Delegates to `iterator1()` by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
$iter: (xform: FnAny<Transducer<any, any>>, args: any[], impl?: typeof iterator1) => IterableIterator<any> | undefined
```
